data.lyric:
[ti:Come Back As A Country Boy]
[ar:Blake Shelton]
[al:Come Back As A Country Boy]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Come Back As A Country Boy - Blake Shelton
[00:03.01]Lyrics by：Jordan Schmidt/Josh Thompson/Michael Hardy
[00:06.02]When I die I wanna come back as a country boy
[00:11.43]
[00:12.74]No there ain't no better life if you ask me
[00:19.46]
[00:19.96]If my neck don't come out red
[00:22.82]
[00:23.55]Then Lord just keep me dead
[00:26.12]
[00:26.84]'Cause a country boy's all that I know how to be
[00:32.42]
[00:39.15]My back is always breaking
[00:41.63]
[00:42.23]My dogs are always barking
[00:45.40]My money has trouble making
[00:48.06]And my truck has trouble starting
[00:51.02]
[00:51.73]I'm up before the sun
[00:54.36]Either hauling hay or hunting
[00:57.22]
[00:57.99]My work ain't ever done but son
[01:01.17]I wouldn't trade it for nothing
[01:03.60]So when I die I wanna come back as a country boy
[01:09.12]
[01:10.29]No there ain't no better life if you ask me
[01:16.29]
[01:16.84]If my neck don't come out red
[01:19.21]
[01:20.08]Then Lord just keep me dead
[01:22.42]
[01:23.22]'Cause a country boy's all that I know how to be
[01:28.07]
[01:28.92]Yeah if y'all ain't in my
[01:30.72]Drawl and a fish ain't on my wall
[01:32.75]And the whiskey don't burn going down
[01:36.01]My feet ain't in a holler and blue ain't on my collar
[01:39.29]Leave my Hank-cranking beer-drinking a*s in the ground
[01:44.94]
[01:48.13]Yeah when I die I wanna come back as a country boy
[01:53.31]
[01:54.35]No there ain't no better life if you ask me
[02:00.96]If my neck don't come out red
[02:03.42]
[02:04.35]Then Lord just keep me dead
[02:06.73]
[02:07.56]'Cause a country boy's all that
[02:09.41]I know how to be
[02:14.05]
[02:26.18]When I die I wanna come back as a country boy
[02:31.19]
[02:32.05]Live on this land like my old man did before me
[02:38.88]I don't wanna be born into money
[02:41.43]
[02:42.28]Where the boots don't ever get muddy
[02:44.77]
[02:45.40]'Cause a country boy's all that I know how to be
[02:50.72]
[02:51.25]Yeah when I die I wanna come back as a country boy
[02:56.40]
[02:57.69]No there ain't no better life if you ask me
[03:03.97]If my neck don't come out red
[03:06.62]
[03:07.44]Then Lord just keep me dead
[03:09.88]
[03:10.61]'Cause a country boy's all that I know how to be
[03:15.45]
[03:16.85]Yeah a country boy's all that I know how to be
data.trans:
[ti:Come Back As A Country Boy]
[ar:Blake Shelton]
[al:Come Back As A Country Boy]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:03.01]//
[00:06.02]当我离开人世我想回到故乡
[00:11.43]
[00:12.74]如果你问我这世上没有更好的生活
[00:19.46]
[00:19.96]如果我的脖子没有通红
[00:22.82]
[00:23.55]那上帝就让我死去吧
[00:26.12]
[00:26.84]因为乡下男孩就是我的全部
[00:32.42]
[00:39.15]我总是腰酸背痛
[00:41.63]
[00:42.23]我的狗总是狂吠
[00:45.40]我的钱很难挣
[00:48.06]我的车发动不了
[00:51.02]
[00:51.73]我在太阳升起之前醒来
[00:54.36]不是拖草就是打猎
[00:57.22]
[00:57.99]我的使命尚未完成但是孩子
[01:01.17]我不会白白拿去交换
[01:03.60]所以当我死去时我想回到家乡做个男孩
[01:09.12]
[01:10.29]如果你问我这世上没有更好的生活
[01:16.29]
[01:16.84]如果我的脖子没有通红
[01:19.21]
[01:20.08]那上帝就让我死去吧
[01:22.42]
[01:23.22]因为乡下男孩就是我的全部
[01:28.07]
[01:28.92]如果你们都不在我的身边
[01:30.72]拖拖拉拉我的墙上没有挂一条鱼
[01:32.75]威士忌酒不会烂掉
[01:36.01]我的双脚不再颤抖我的衣领也没有蓝色
[01:39.29]让我喝着美酒醉生梦死
[01:44.94]
[01:48.13]当我死去时我想回到家乡做个好孩子
[01:53.31]
[01:54.35]如果你问我这世上没有更好的生活
[02:00.96]如果我的脖子没有通红
[02:03.42]
[02:04.35]那上帝就让我死去吧
[02:06.73]
[02:07.56]因为乡下小子就是这样
[02:09.41]我知道怎样做人
[02:14.05]
[02:26.18]当我离开人世我想回到故乡
[02:31.19]
[02:32.05]在这片土地上活下去就像我老爹在我之前那样
[02:38.88]我不想生来就腰缠万贯
[02:41.43]
[02:42.28]鞋子永远不会沾上泥
[02:44.77]
[02:45.40]因为乡下男孩就是我的全部
[02:50.72]
[02:51.25]当我死去时我想回到家乡做个好孩子
[02:56.40]
[02:57.69]如果你问我这世上没有更好的生活
[03:03.97]如果我的脖子没有通红
[03:06.62]
[03:07.44]那上帝就让我死去吧
[03:09.88]
[03:10.61]因为乡下男孩就是我的全部
[03:15.45]
[03:16.85]我只知道做个乡下男孩
